timeline.message: fix: unit test GzipCompressorTest#testCompressAndDecompress gzip decompress error

timeline.bodyText: The close method of GZIPOutputStream should be called.And the close method of ByteArrayOutputStream actually does nothing.
timeline.author: xingfudeshi

timeline.bodyText: The close method of GZIPInputStream should be called.
timeline.author: xingfudeshi

timeline.bodyText: Is it necessary here? close will call the finish method.
timeline.author: slievrly

replies.bodyText:
Is it necessary here? close will call the finish method.

Of course not. If you do not call the flush method and the finish method before the close method, you will not be able to write data into the stream. Since the return statement will return before the finally block, the data was not written into the stream at that time, which caused compression failure. Further decompression failed, and I wrote a new unit test method for compression and decompression testing.
replies.author: InstallingB
